dublinCore.dc:title: 115 HR 1541 IH: To authorize the Secretary of the Interior to acquire certain property related to the Fort Scott National Historic Site in Fort Scott, Kansas, and for other purposes.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Ms. Jenkins of Kansas introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Natural Resources

form.official-title: To authorize the Secretary of the Interior to acquire certain property related to the Fort Scott National Historic Site in Fort Scott, Kansas, and for other purposes.

section.text: The Act entitled An Act to authorize establishment of the Fort Scott National Historic Site, Kansas, and for other purposes., approved October 19, 1978 (Public Law 95–484) is amended—

subparagraph.text: by inserting only after donation; and
by striking : Provided, that the buildings so acquired shall not include the structure known as Lunette Blair; and
by striking When the site of and inserting (a) When the site of; and
by adding at the end the following:

subsection.text: The boundary of the Fort Scott National Historic Site established under subsection (a) is modified as generally depicted on the map referred to as Fort Scott National Historic Site Proposed Boundary Modification, numbered 471/80,057C, and dated February 2017.
